title: 没权限，跪求大神解答！！
author: xin_xing
txt_content:
加了权限插件之后……是op都没法调时间/spawn都不得，输指令后是：你没有这个命令的权限。跪求解答{:10_528:}mangadd id overz后就：[信息] GroupManager version 2.0 (Pre2.10.1.4) (Phoenix) 被禁用!
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - = = = 错 误 报 告 = = = 2.0 (Pre2.10.1.4) (Phoenix) =
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - === 请复制粘贴错误报告Error.log ==
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - = 并递交给一个Essentials开发人员 =
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - null
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - ===================================================
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE - = 错误报告结束 =
>

12:39:11 [严重] GroupManager - SEVERE -跪求大神解答{:10_503:}
